e.v: Prgm :Disp "=== GDP METHODS GUIDE ===" :Disp " " :Disp "OBSHIE PRAVILA:" :Disp "1. Vse po rynochnym cenam" :Disp "2. Zapasy na konec = +I" :Disp "3. Export(+), Import(-)" :Disp "4. Zarplata v dohodah" :Disp " " :Disp "METHOD 1: PO DS" :Disp "GDP = DS1 + DS2 + ..." :Disp "DS = Vyruchka + dZ*P" :Disp " - Promezhut.zatraty" :Disp " " :Disp "METHOD 2: PO RASHODAM" :Disp "GDP = C + I + NX" :Disp "C = rashody na tovary" :Disp "I = prirost zapasov*P" :Disp "NX = Export - Import" :Disp " " :Disp "METHOD 3: PO DOHODAM" :Disp "GDP = Zarplata + Pribyl" :Disp "Pribyl = Vyruchka+dZ*P" :Disp " -Syryo-Zarplata" :EndPrgm

Prgm :Disp "TIPOVOI PRIMER" :Disp "Pshenica -> Hleb" :Disp " " :Disp "Pshenica:" :Disp "Proizv: 50k c * $3=150k" :Disp "dZapasy: 5k c * $3=15k" :Disp "Export: 25k c * $3=75k" :Disp " " :Disp "Hleb:" :Disp "Prodan: 50k b * $2=100k" :Disp "Import: 15k b * $1=15k" :Disp " " :Disp "Zatraty pekarja:" :Disp "Pshenica: 20k c*$3=60k" :Disp " " :Disp "Zarplata:" :Disp "Fermer A: 50k" :Disp "Pekar B: 20k" :Disp "Total ZP: 70k" :Disp " " :Disp "GDP = 190k (3 metoda)" :EndPrgm

Prgm :Disp "RASCHET PO 3 METODAM" :Disp " " :Disp "METHOD 1: PO DS" :Disp "DS_fermer:" :Disp "150k+15k-0 = 165k" :Disp "DS_pekar:" :Disp "100k+0-60k = 25k" :Disp "GDP = 165k+25k = 190k" :Disp " " :Disp "METHOD 2: PO RASHODAM" :Disp "C = 100k+15k = 115k" :Disp "I = 15k" :Disp "NX = 75k-15k = 60k" :Disp "GDP = 115k+15k+60k" :Disp " = 190k" :Disp " " :Disp "METHOD 3: PO DOHODAM" :Disp "ZP = 50k+20k = 70k" :Disp "Prib_A=150k+15k-50k" :Disp " =115k" :Disp "Prib_B=100k-60k-20k" :Disp " =5k" :Disp "GDP = 70k+115k+5k" :Disp " = 190k" :EndPrgm
